scripts.docker:rebuild: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml down -v && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml up --build
scripts.docker:rebuild:bg: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml down -v && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml up -d --build
scripts.docker:exec:web: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml exec web sh
scripts.docker:clean: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml down -v && docker system prune -f
